description: This source file implements a service for analyzing stock growth over a specified time period, including functions to select relevant price data, perform growth calculations, and handle data retrieval through a finance client. It defines data structures, core analysis functions, and error handling logic.

classes.name: SeriesSelection
classes.description: Data class representing a selected range of stock price data including indices, dates, prices, and warnings.

methods.name: Optional[float] _select_price(bar: PriceBar, field: PriceField)
methods.description: Selects specific price (adjusted close, open, or default close) from a PriceBar based on the given PriceField.

methods.name: SeriesSelection _pick_endpoints(bars: List[PriceBar], field: PriceField)
methods.description: Determines start and end points within a list of PriceBars based on available data and selected PriceField; returns a SeriesSelection object.

methods.name: Tuple[List[GrowthResult],List[str]] analyze_growth(req: AnalyzeGrowthRequest, client: FinanceClient)
methods.description: Main function that computes stock growth metrics over a date range for given tickers using a finance client, applying optional growth percentage filters and limit.
